alert.note: Alert for Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 8:40PM EST until February 15 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tallahassee FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Ochlockonee River near Thomasville (US 84) affecting Grady and Thomas Counties. For the Ochlockonee River...including Thomasville (US 84), Concord (CR 12), Havana (US 27), Bloxham (SR 20), Smith Creek (CR 366)... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ochlockonee River near Thomasville (US 84). * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Multiple access roads to boat ramps throughout the basin are flooded. Widespread flooding of wooded bottomland and adjacent farmland occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EST Friday the stage was 6.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday afternoon to a crest of 16.5 feet early Monday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.5 feet on 04/20/2014. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday afternoon at 245 PM EST.
